Dear Travelers, Genshin Impact is joining Twitch to bring you the "Adventurers' Guild on Twitch" event! Come join us on Twitch to start a new adventure!

Support your favorite streamer to receive an event-exclusive wind glider: [[Wings of Feasting]]!

==Event Duration==
November 25, 1:00 – December 8, 23:59 (UTC+8)

==How to Participate==
# All Travelers need to log into their Twitch account during the event
# Go to a channel that is [[Adventurers' Guild on Twitch#List of Participating Channels|participating in the event]]
# Travelers can obtain in-game items, including the exclusive Wings of Feasting wind glider, by supporting participating Twitch creators during the event. By purchasing two months of eligible Tier 1 subscriptions to select Twitch channels'''*''', travelers will receive a reward redemption code'''**''' for the Wings of Feasting wind glider, 30,000 Mora, Jade Parcels, 2 Tonkotsu Ramen, and 2 Sautéed Matsutake.
:<nowiki>*</nowiki>See list of participating creators and additional qualifying actions in the FAQs section in the official announcement
:<nowiki>**</nowiki>Only Travelers who have reached Adventure Rank 10 or above can use the redemption code

==Notes==
# Users must purchase a new sub or gift a subscription during the campaign period, and only while the broadcaster '''is actively live streaming''' "Genshin Impact" category with the  "Wings of Feasting" tag.
# Each Twitch user can only get one redemption code, and each Genshin Impact account can only use one redemption code. Accounts that have already used the redemption code will not be able to redeem it again.
# Please do not lose the redemption code, the redemption code will not be reissued~
# Only Travelers who have reached Adventure Rank 10 or above can use the redemption code~
# The redemption code is valid within one week after the event ends (until December 15, 23:59 UTC+8), please redeem it in time~
# Anonymous gift subscriptions and recurring subscriptions will not be counted in this event.
# During the event, you can also get a redemption code by making a total of two new Tier 1 subscriptions (or gift subscriptions) on two channels.
# Subscriptions made before the event are considered invalid. Please subscribe during the event duration~
# Subscriptions obtained through Amazon Prime and existing recurring subscriptions will not count in this event.
